amendment.description: Amendment appropriates $4 billion in FY 2000 funds to reduce the publicly held debt.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in part A of House Report 106-549 to appropriate $4 billion in FY 2000 funds to reduce publicly held debt.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Toomey amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 420 - 0, 3 Present (Roll no. 83).
